【考法 1】 v. 诽谤，造谣，中伤： to utter maliciously false statements, charges, or imputations about
【例】the Cui wife didn't say any words that calumniate you
【近】 asperse[ə'spɜːs] , blacken, defame, libel['laɪb(ə)l], malign[mə'laɪn], smear[smɪə] , traduce, vilify['vɪlɪfaɪ]
【反】 flattering 谄媚的；vindicate 辩护； approbation 嘉许
【派】 calumny n. 诽谤、中伤： a false statement maliciously made to injure another's reputation；calumnious 造谣的
【记】 column 专栏；现在媒体的专栏里经常见到诽谤,诋毁,造谣中伤,尤其是娱乐版
